name: Zagara
title: Broodmother of the Swarm
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 damage to enemies it hits. Stores up to 4 charges.

abilities.name: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 68 damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Infested Drop
abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 147 damage. The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 29 damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

heroics.name: Devouring Maw
heroics.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

heroics.name: Nydus Network
heroics.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by .75 seconds.

original.name: Zagara
original.title: Broodmother of the Swarm
original.description: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her minions on the field of battle. Encounter her brood and beware: Mess with her children, and you answer to mama.
original.shortDescription: A Summoner who provides lots of vision of the battleground.

baseHeroInfo.name: Zagara
baseHeroInfo.title: Broodmother of the Swarm
baseHeroInfo.description: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her minions on the field of battle. Encounter her brood and beware: Mess with her children, and you answer to mama.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Summoner who provides lots of vision of the battleground.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

trait.name: Creep Tumor
trait.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds and reveal the surrounding area while active. Stores up to 3 charges.

skins.name: Broodmother of the Swarm
skins.description: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her minions on the field of battle. Encounter her brood and beware: Mess with her children, and you answer to mama.

skins.name: Overqueen Zagara
skins.description: As his Queen ordered, Abathur augmented Zagara, allowing her more flexible thinking and a stronger control over her brood... but there's always room for more improvement.

skins.name: Desert Queen Zagara
skins.description: The sands of Luxoria are ever-shifting. In ancient times, they were ruled by the Scorpid Swarm, and if the ancient Queen Zagara has her way, they shall be once again.

skins.name: Insectoid Zagara
skins.description: Dr. Wright hypothesized only insects could survive in the apocalypse. Years later, as the mutated hivemother's pincers closed around his neck, he realized how right he was.
